title: Tell me about a memorable experience at the library.

korean: 대학생 때 도서관에서 있었던 일이 기억나.
시험 기간이라 도서관이 사람들로 가득 찼었어.
자리 잡으려고 새벽부터 줄 서서 기다렸어.
겨우 자리 잡고 하루 종일 공부했어.
점심때 잠깐 나갔다 왔는데, 자리에 책이랑 노트를 두고 갔어.
근데 돌아와 보니까 누가 내 자리에 앉아 있더라고.
너무 황당해서 그 사람한테 얘기했더니 미안하다고 하더라.
결국 다시 자리를 찾아야 했는데, 빈자리가 없었어.
그때부터는 자리 비울 때 꼭 친구한테 부탁하고 가게 됐어.
english: I remember something that happened at the library when I was a college student.
It was exam period, so the library was packed with people.
I waited in line from dawn to get a seat.
I barely got a seat and studied all day.
I went out briefly for lunch, leaving my books and notes at my seat.
But when I came back, someone was sitting in my seat.
I was so absurd that I talked to that person, and they apologized.
They said there were no seats.
Eventually I had to find a seat again, but there were no empty seats.
I sat on a chair in the hallway and studied.
From then on, when leaving my seat, I definitely ask a friend to watch it.
